DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Spanish Rainbow Face Paint Palette (8 Colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
Each Snazaroo Spanish Rainbow Face Paint Palette comes with eight Snazaroo colors, an application sponge and a mini brush, along with the Snazaroo full color guide which shows step by step instructions in Spanish for several faces, face painting ideas and resources, making it ideal for beginner face painters.
The Snazaroo Spanish Rainbow Palette includes Snazaroo Face Paint which applies smoothly, can be easily blended and will dry in about 30 seconds to a streak-free, durable finish. Snazaroo Face Paints are hypoallergenic and the world's safest face paints, meeting US FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety and the only face paint with a Child Toy Safety Rating. Snazaroo paint is non-toxic and easy to use face paint that is water-based, fragrance-free and wash off easily. Snazaroo Face Paint gives brightly colored, totally opaque coverage.
Snazaroo Spanish Rainbow Face Paint Palette includes eight 2 ml colors: white (000), black (111), bright red (0055), orange (553), bright yellow (222), bright green (444), sky blue (355) and bright pink (0058).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 8 color Snazaroo Spanish Rainbow Face Paint Palette will easily paint 50 full faces or over 1,000 (2" x 2") cheek art designs
One of the most popular face paints in the world
This palette puts 8 great colors in one convenient place

Snazaroo Spanish Rainbow Face Paint Palette includes eight 2 ml colors: white (000), black (111), bright red (0055), orange (553), bright yellow (222), bright green (444), sky blue (355) and bright pink (0058)
